alert.note: Alert for Blount; Knox; Loudon; Monroe; Roane; Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 1:12PM CDT until June 25 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR LOUDON...SOUTHWESTERN KNOX...BLOUNT...NORTHEASTERN MONROE... SOUTHEASTERN ROANE AND SOUTHERN SEVIER COUNTIES... At 209 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Rockford to near Maryville to 15 miles south of Louisville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Local dispatch reported numerous trees down across Loudon county. Additionally half inch diameter hail was reported in Maryville. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Maryville, Lenoir City, Alcoa, Loudon, Gatlinburg, Farragut, Pigeon Forge, Louisville and Rockford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 367 and 385. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 73 and 84. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blount; Knox; Loudon; Monroe; Roane; Sevier
